Text: How exactly do you rid yourself of commentary audio tracks?  Cannot find the options to change them. Do they have a file name, for commentaries? Please help
How do you rid your download of commentary tracks. Cannot find a way in any option. Is there a file name to delete? Please help

Had that problem with some of the previous collections, for whatever reason the commentary is only on in Windows Media Player, if you use a different program such as VLC you won't have to deal with the the constant chatter.
